displays an analysis of your last game.
!raram help: displays all commands and their description.
!raram profile <name>: displays the rARAM profile of another player.
!raram champion <name>: displays the rARAM Stats of a champion.
!raram verify <name>: links your Discord to your LoL account.
!raram leaderboards: displays the top 5 players in each category.
